sentences.sContent: It distracts us, and takes our arousal back to the starting blocks.
sentences.sContent_eng: It distracts us, and takes our arousal back to the starting blocks.
sentences.sCn: 它分散我们的注意力，使我们的觉醒又回到了起点。

sentences.sContent: I asked as a primitive sense of arousal kicked in at the base of my medulla.
sentences.sContent_eng: I asked as a primitive sense of arousal kicked in at the base of my medulla.
sentences.sCn: 真够神的，”我回答说，脑子里似乎有一种原始的欲望在觉醒，在升腾。
